title: Could be worse
text: Our hotel in the city cancelled at the last second and this was only one of two rooms available. Definately not worth $175/night. The Good: great location - excellent for walking and taking the bus ($40 cab from the airport). The bathroom was renovated and very clean. Our smoking room did not smell. The best breakfast in the city is across the street (Home Plate).The bad: no amenities - esp at $175 a night. Make sure you check for TP before you use the bathroom. This seems to be a common problem.
